When you were about halfway through the alleyway, you looked to your left and saw a strange door.

info.brief_description: Of all the worlds out there, these are some of the weirdest ones out there
info.description:
I created this interactive as a sort of spiritual successor to Kamon Keronji’s Anime Dimensional Hallway. An interactive that I contributed a decent amount of chapters to and I was mad that it got deleted. So I’ve been sitting on this idea for a while. The main problem that I felt that the original interactive had was that there are too many story options and not enough actual chapters, so I decided to limit the range of genres so that there could be more focus on the chapters.

1. All new anime/manga submissions must be include the ecchi and or harem genre, no reverse harem
2. Must have some general knowledge of the anime/manga that you're adding to
3. The main character can have a different name for each different anime/manga (meaning he could be called this name in one anime/manga, but be called another name in a different one)
4. No death, vore or toilet stuff
5. No gay, but lesbian is allowed
6. Have fun

The anime and manga shown in this interactive belong to their respective owners/creators.
